name: bcartifacturlproxy
description: Get artifact URLs for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central
author: Arthur van de Vondervoort

inputs.name: instanceUri
inputs.label: Instance Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide an Url in case your running your own instance of a bcartifacturl-proxy

inputs.name: country
inputs.label: Country
inputs.helpMarkDown: The requested localization of Business Central (default is xx)

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of Business Central (will search for entries where the version starts with this value of the parameter)

inputs.name: select
inputs.label: Select
inputs.helpMarkDown: All or only the latest (Default Latest):

inputs.name: storageAccount
inputs.label: Storage Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: The storageAccount that is being used where artifacts are stored (default is bcartifacts, usually should not be changed).

inputs.name: sasToken
inputs.label: SAS-token
inputs.helpMarkDown: The token that for accessing protected Azure Blob Storage. Make sure to set the right storageAccount! Note that Business Central Insider artifacts doesn't require a sasToken after October 1st 2023, you can use the switch -accept_insiderEula to accept the EULA instead.

inputs.name: accept_insiderEula
inputs.label: accept_insiderEula
inputs.helpMarkDown: Accept the EULA for Business Central Insider artifacts. This is required for using Business Central Insider artifacts without providing a SAS token after October 1st 2023.
